Author: smallpaleandsad
Text: Don’t beat yourself up over those thoughts. That’s why they’re called intrusive, you know you don’t feel that way and would never ever say that about him. Sometimes I think those thoughts come from a place that we know are wrong to say or think and then make us fear when they come out of nowhere. You love him and know how you truly feel, take it easy on yourself and give him some extra love today.
